document_data.name: Thoughts on Politics and Other Villainies
document_data.author: [[Mirt]]
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Thoughts on Politics and Other Villainies''''' was a [[book]] written by [[Mirt|Mirt "the Moneylender"]] of [[Waterdeep]] and published in the {{YearlinkName|1343}}.{{Cite polyhedron/98/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: More Hidden Powers of Turmish|23}}
{{quote|''The true rulers of a kingdom are seldom who ye think they are. Always look for the hidden; even if ye don't find it. There'll be some hint of where real power lies... and besides: the sneaking and peering about is always good fun.''|Excerpt from ''Thoughts on Politics and Other Villainies''}}
